routines.title: Morning Energizer
routines.description: A quick routine to wake up your body and mind. Perfect to jumpstart your day.

steps.name: Neck Rolls
steps.instruction: Slowly roll your neck in a full circle, first clockwise then counterclockwise.

steps.name: Shoulder Circles
steps.instruction: Rotate your shoulders in a circular motion to loosen up tension.

steps.name: Torso Twists
steps.instruction: Gently twist your torso from side to side to awaken your core.

routines.title: Desk Break
routines.description: A quick routine to relieve stiffness and boost circulation during a busy workday.

steps.name: Seated Shoulder Rolls
steps.instruction: While seated, roll your shoulders to release built-up tension.

steps.name: Wrist Stretches
steps.instruction: Gently stretch your wrists and forearms to combat typing strain.

steps.name: Standing Forward Bend
steps.instruction: Stand and slowly bend forward to stretch your back and legs.

routines.title: Full Body Flow
routines.description: A comprehensive routine designed to improve overall mobility and flexibility.

steps.name: Neck Rolls
steps.instruction: Begin with gentle neck rolls to ease tension.

steps.name: Shoulder Circles
steps.instruction: Perform shoulder rotations to prepare for deeper stretches.

steps.name: Hamstring Stretch
steps.instruction: Reach toward your toes to lengthen your hamstrings.

steps.name: Quad Stretch
steps.instruction: Pull your ankle toward your buttock to stretch your quadriceps.

routines.title: Post-Workout Recovery
routines.description: Cool down and aid muscle recovery with this targeted post-workout routine.

steps.name: Chest Opener
steps.instruction: Extend your arms out and open up your chest to improve posture.

steps.name: Back Stretch
steps.instruction: Gently arch your back to release tension from your spine.

steps.name: Leg Stretch
steps.instruction: Sit down and extend your legs forward to stretch your lower body.

routines.title: Evening Wind Down
routines.description: A calming routine to relax your body and mind before sleep.

steps.name: Gentle Neck Stretches
steps.instruction: Ease your neck muscles with slow, gentle stretches.

steps.name: Shoulder Shrugs
steps.instruction: Lift your shoulders and then drop them to release stress.

steps.name: Calm Breathing
steps.instruction: Focus on deep, slow breaths to prepare your body for rest.

routines.title: Flexibility Booster
routines.description: Increase your range of motion with a series of dynamic stretches.

steps.name: Dynamic Leg Swings
steps.instruction: Swing your legs forward and backward to loosen up your hip joints.

steps.name: Side Lunges
steps.instruction: Perform lateral lunges to stretch your inner thighs and improve balance.

steps.name: Hip Circles
steps.instruction: Rotate your hips in circular motions to open up the pelvic area.

routines.title: Stress Relief Routine
routines.description: A calming sequence to alleviate stress and tension after a long day.

steps.name: Deep Breathing
steps.instruction: Focus on slow, deep breaths to center your mind.

steps.name: Seated Forward Bend
steps.instruction: Sit down and gently lean forward to relax your back and legs.

steps.name: Mindful Stretch
steps.instruction: Perform a slow stretch of your arms and back while staying mindful of your breath.

routines.title: Yoga Flow
routines.description: A gentle yoga-inspired sequence to improve balance, strength, and mindfulness.

steps.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
steps.instruction: Alternate between arching and rounding your back to warm up your spine.

steps.name: Downward Dog
steps.instruction: Form an inverted V with your body, stretching your back and legs.

steps.name: Child's Pose
steps.instruction: Sit back on your heels and stretch your arms forward for a gentle release.

steps.name: Warrior II
steps.instruction: Step into a lunge and extend your arms outward, holding strong.

routines.title: Active Break
routines.description: A short burst of movement to energize you during a busy day.

steps.name: Jumping Jacks
steps.instruction: Perform gentle jumping jacks to get your blood flowing.

steps.name: Arm Circles
steps.instruction: Circle your arms forward and backward to loosen your shoulder joints.

steps.name: High Knees
steps.instruction: Lift your knees high with each step to boost energy.

routines.title: Yoga Stretch & Relax
routines.description: A calming yoga sequence to stretch and relax your entire body.

steps.name: Mountain Pose
steps.instruction: Stand tall with your feet together and relax your arms by your sides.

steps.name: Tree Pose
steps.instruction: Balance on one leg while placing the opposite foot on your inner thigh.

steps.name: Seated Twist
steps.instruction: Sit down and gently twist your torso to each side to release tension.
